title: Feedback Design Model Development and Application for Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental job-related language competency and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: A language acquisition process for professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields to enhance job performance, with project-based assessments evaluating practical application skills

learning_goals: Learners can construct an effective feedback system by utilizing the design criteria for each stage of the 6-step feedback model (6P/FB-Model).
Learners can improve their self-assessment competencies through peer and instructor feedback in a blended learning environment.
Learners can improve job-related communication skills by 20% or more by incorporating feedback during language project implementation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
